summary:
oversaturated   ,  unbalance light  , bad config , unreality ,  cartoon-look  , red-evil  sky   ,SUPER BLUE-SKY , night and interior in some place or all are brighter than 
origin game, MAY BE  KILL YOUR FPS .
descriptionHtml:
i am happy to create a enb for my friend here and fox-forum.

it s kind of gift in valentine-day. may be  it s too late ^----------^

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDIT

-MAIN ENB V.149  BY BORIS.
 http://www.enbdev.com

-Matso Immersive Bloom v4.1.7   BY MATSO (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/151807)
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25451/

-enbeffect.fx  by JAWZ(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/196978) ( --JawZ--Mixed enbeffect.fx Code blend between Boris, HD6 and ENB Evolved enbeffect.fx).i just change a little value in that file .

-enbprepass <dof>  by RAGNAROKLUCIFER (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3360789)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30850/   Diffusion DOF for ENB  

-ENBSeries effect file  by BORIS


-my friend in fox s forum that help me test my  crazy  enb with no fear ^-----^ .

bas17666 , Armlay  , jackhammer02,  ben10omnitrix  and Otakula55.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/723/79672561.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img521/9568/56248151.jpg[/IMG]

i spent  70/100 of  time for write this description and 30/100 of time  to create this mod.

so you should read it carefully OR  look at image-section..



i want my mod to be 

1. oversaturated   ,  unbalance light  , bad config , unreality ,  cartoon-look  , red-evil  sky   ,SUPER BLUE-SKY , night and interior in some place or all are brighter than 
origin game\"

i like the thing that people said  \" unnatural  , unrealism\"  

thats main  idea that i want  my enb to be .



[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img824/2057/screenshot135g.png[/IMG]


2.  day , night and interior  have different mood .

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img7/1835/011sr.png[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/4053/30350548.png[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/2914/66168101.jpg[/IMG]

3. if user  have some better texture mod such as  2k texture ....bra bra  . this enb  can create some nice  or crazy  screenshot.

4  i dont test  this enb with other lighting mod .  but i think it is fun to test it yourself .


-i test  my enb with climate of tamrial , and i like it .

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img32/6484/screenshot277w.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img189/6047/0cottest.jpg[/IMG]
 
5 look at my screenshot. it is better than my word anyway  ^---^

most of images was taken when dof is off.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

clear ?


[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img831/4087/tesv2013040114041526.jpg [/img]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ABOUT MY PC AND FPS

i play this with ( win 7 , 3 gigcpu, hd4670 video card ,4 gig ram on 1600*900, skyrim-detail ultra mode , aa  +af  off) and i got  10 fps. 


i think  if  i turn of  ssao  i will  rasie  some fps ,  i dont test it yet .  i love ssao.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

so i think  if you have simple pc you can run this without any problem.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

installation

1 download enbv.149 here  <http://www.mediafire.com/?gg8iass6rljjw17>

//the file is no longer on boris s site.//


2 copy all the file in you skyrim folder.
3 TURN OFF your AA+AF 
4. read and follow this  instruction .

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 must be set in SkyrimPrefs.ini file to make this mod work. Start SkyrimLauncher.exe to configure your video options again.
To work correctly, sky lighting require rendering objects to shadow, so edit manually following lines in file SkyrimPrefs.ini:
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1



if you dont need my file , just delete all file . easy


feel free leave comment  if you have a time or you want to tell me something  . thank you.

you can help me by upload your image , i  design this for good pc but i  have poor pc.

i really want to see what will happen in other pc .
author: me and my eyes
